overview: Rex Allerton is a top Hollywood star and an idol of the female population. To get away from the pressure of the fans who won't leave him alone, he relocates to a remote Italian village where unanticipated trouble arises when unwittingly he becomes the prize for an international lottery.
tagline: Ten million women wanted Hollywood's top star on a string...But the lucky ticket-holder had his wedding night wrapped up!
title: The Love Lottery
